about_the_game:
Snatch Media Toolbox contains a Radio Stream Player with Gif Visuals, Audio Player with Search, MP4 Screensaver, Screen Recorder: 60fps, WebCam Viewer, File Converter and Timer.

Features

  • Desktop Screen Recorder 60fps MKV with its own audio device, for quick start up
  • Video and Audio Converter for MP4 to MP3, MKV to MP4 60fps, any audio to mp3
  • Recording Timer controls all aspects of the toolbox
  • Audio Media Player, plays mp3, aac, flac, wav, ogg, aiff and m4a formats. Save your whole music collection and convert to playlists or use the Jukebox.
  • Radio Stream Player with Transitional Gif images & Recorder: MP3 an M3U8 Streams. Over 40 International Radio Stations or simply import your own stations.
  • GifPlayer plays multiple random gifs while your music or radio plays
  • Video Loop Screensaver plays multiple video loops while your music or radio plays
  • WebCam Viewer


Snatch Media Toolbox Radio... Helping you to keep up with the very latest News and Music from your part of the world and every other.
detailed_description:
Snatch Media Toolbox contains a Radio Stream Player with Gif Visuals, Audio Player with Search, MP4 Screensaver, Screen Recorder: 60fps, WebCam Viewer, File Converter and Timer.

Features

  • Desktop Screen Recorder 60fps MKV with its own audio device, for quick start up
  • Video and Audio Converter for MP4 to MP3, MKV to MP4 60fps, any audio to mp3
  • Recording Timer controls all aspects of the toolbox
  • Audio Media Player, plays mp3, aac, flac, wav, ogg, aiff and m4a formats. Save your whole music collection and convert to playlists or use the Jukebox.
  • Radio Stream Player with Transitional Gif images & Recorder: MP3 an M3U8 Streams. Over 40 International Radio Stations or simply import your own stations.
  • GifPlayer plays multiple random gifs while your music or radio plays
  • Video Loop Screensaver plays multiple video loops while your music or radio plays
  • WebCam Viewer

name: Snatch Media Toolbox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated/dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any dedicated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated/dedicated GPU with WDDM 1.0 driver.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any dedicated

reviews:
“10/10 best $5 steam app I've bought. Must have for creators and artists. Should be built into windows but never will be so spend $5 and get this awesome app and support a small developer instead.”
10/10 – Varen Dabs Alot
short_description: Inside Snatch Media Toolbox you will find a Radio Stream Player with Gif Visuals, Audio Player with Search, MP4 Screensaver, Screen Recorder: 60fps, WebCam Viewer, File Converter and Timer.
